<h3 id="X30478">X(30478) = CENTER OF THE DUAL CONIC OF THE YIU CONIC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; (3*a^3+3*(b+c)*a^2-(b^2-6*b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*(-a+b+c)  :  :
<p>
Let A<sub>b</sub>, A<sub>c</sub> be the touchpoints of the A-excircle and sides AB and AC, respectively, and define B<sub>c</sub>, B<sub>a</sub>, C<sub>a</sub>, C<sub>b</sub> cyclically. These six points lie on the Yiu conic, defined at X(478).
<br>
The perspector of this dual conic is X(30479).</p>
<p>X(30478) lies on these lines:
{1,5745}, {2,12}, {3,1602}, {4,993}, {7,15823}, {8,2320}, {9,1125}, {10,631}, {11,452}, {20,2886}, {21,497}, {35,5082}, {36,443}, {40,6935}, {48,966}, {63,3485}, {65,5744}, {71,10476}, {72,16193}, {75,6337}, {104,6889}, {140,9708}, {142,3361}, {145,18231}, {154,20306}, {210,27383}, {220,24512}, {261,30479}, {281,7521}, {329,11375}, {354,960}, {355,6954}, {376,5267}, {377,19841}, {390,3813}, {8167,17554}, {8227,12572}, {9701,11003}, {9710,15717}, {10167,18251}, {10200,17559}, {10448,11269}, {10591,11113}, {10934,19528}, {11036,11281}, {11108,15325}, {11110,27509}, {11365,17560}, {13411,25568}, {14001,17030}, {15171,17571}, {15654,19262}, {16678,27621}, {17314,17733}, {18250,19862}, {23207,27407}, {24363,24432}, {24570,27339}</p>
<p>
X(30478) = complement of X(5261)<br>
X(30478) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 2975, 388), (2, 3436, 10588), (11194, 25466, 3600)<br>
</p>
